typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	dt as date (toDate('2021-01-27'))
}
source(output(
		ARPT_NAME as string,
		ARPT_CITY as string,
		ARPT_CNTRY as string,
		ARPT_IATA_CD as string,
		ARPT_ICAO_CD as string,
		ARPT_LAT as double,
		ARPT_LONG as double,
		ARPT_ALTD as integer,
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET as double,
		ARPT_DST as string,
		ARPT_TZONE as string,
		LAST_UPDT_DT as date,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StgArpt
source(output(
		ARPT_ID as integer,
		ARPT_IATA_CD as string,
		ARPT_ICAO_CD as string,
		ARPT_NAME as string,
		ARPT_CNTRY as string,
		ARPT_CITY as string,
		ARPT_LAT as decimal(8,6),
		ARPT_LONG as decimal(9,6),
		ARPT_ALTD as decimal(6,2),
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET as decimal(2,2),
		ARPT_DST_CD as string,
		ARPT_TZONE as string,
		EFF_STRT_DT as timestamp,
		EFF_END_DT as timestamp,
		ACTV_IND as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DARPT
StgArpt filter(LAST_UPDT_DT > $dt) ~> GetLastestData
DARPT, GetLastestData exists(DARPT@ARPT_IATA_CD == StgArpt@ARPT_IATA_CD || DARPT@ARPT_ICAO_CD ==StgArpt@ARPT_ICAO_CD,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> GetUpdatedRows
GetLastestData, DARPT exists(DARPT@ARPT_IATA_CD == StgArpt@ARPT_IATA_CD || DARPT@ARPT_ICAO_CD ==StgArpt@ARPT_ICAO_CD,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> GetNewRows
GetUpdatedRows alterRow(updateIf(ACTV_IND == 'Y')) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ARPT_ID as integer,
		ARPT_IATA_CD as string,
		ARPT_ICAO_CD as string,
		ARPT_NAME as string,
		ARPT_CNTRY as string,
		ARPT_CITY as string,
		ARPT_LAT as decimal(8,6),
		ARPT_LONG as decimal(9,6),
		ARPT_ALTD as decimal(6,2),
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET as decimal(2,2),
		ARPT_DST_CD as string,
		ARPT_TZONE as string,
		EFF_STRT_DT as timestamp,
		EFF_END_DT as timestamp,
		ACTV_IND as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> WriteUpdates
